Title: Series: Pinacoteca di Milano
Description: Sermon of St Mark in Alexandria, after Gentile Bellini, with the saint standing on a platform in the left foreground and addressing a crowd; in the background, the façade of a church Etching
Curator's comments: After the painting commissioned by the Scuola Grande di San Marco, executed by Gentile Bellini and completed by his brother Giovanni; it is now in the Pinacoteca di Brera in Milan.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: A E Evans & Sons
